attributes.action: command dfence estates to retrofit renewable energy systems to all buildings including SFA on UK MoD Sites
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like a commitment from the Government, MoD and Defence Estates to retrofit all buildings on MoD sites including Single and Service Families accommodation, with renewable energy systems including Solar PV, Solar Thermal and Wind using a 10 year rolling programme.  This energy could be used to power the sites systems, saving money and energy.  Any surplus produced could be exported for sale.
